alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 15 at 7:12PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jefferson, western Garvin, eastern Stephens and northwestern Carter Counties through 745 PM CST... At 711 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles west of Foster to near Sugden. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pauls Valley, Waurika, Elmore City, Velma, Katie, Foster, Tatums, Loco, Ratliff City, Addington, Sugden, Antioch, Hennepin, Fox and Pernell. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 69 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
